snippet: Ms. Sanders previously worked as president and chief executive officer of Fairchild Fashion Media, which Condé Nast sold to Penske Media last month.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Sanders previously worked as president and chief executive officer of Fairchild Fashion Media, which Condé Nast sold to Penske Media last month.

headline.main: Gina Sanders Named President of Global Development at Condé Nast
